H0.text: Which British monarch founded the Yeomen of the Guard, originally as a royal bodyguard. King Edward III

H1.text: Which British monarch founded the Yeomen of the Guard, originally as a royal bodyguard. King Henry V

H2.text: Which British monarch founded the Yeomen of the Guard, originally as a royal bodyguard. King Richard II

H3.text: Which British monarch founded the Yeomen of the Guard, originally as a royal bodyguard. Henry 7

A4.text: The King's Body Guard of the Yeomen of the Guard was created by King Henry VII in 1485 after the Battle of Bosworth Field.
